Detailed Description

Request to change a route in the route storage.

After the normal RequestPacket header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & routeID \ +4 & 4 bytes & createTime \ +8 & 4 bytes & validUntil\ {tabular}
